LanguageData.PrimitiveHydroponic.label: saturated 토양
LanguageData.PrimitiveHydroponic_Blueprint.label: saturated 토양 (청사진)
LanguageData.PrimitiveHydroponic_Frame.label: saturated 토양 (건설 중)
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin.label: advanced hydroponic basin
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin.description: Advanced hydroponic basins grow plants quicker and provide their own light source. The basin requires power to work and plants will die if the power is lost.
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin_Blueprint.label: advanced hydroponic basin (청사진)
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin_Frame.label: advanced hydroponic basin (건설 중)
LanguageData.NewHydroponicsBasin_Frame.description: Advanced hydroponic basins grow plants quicker and provide their own light source. The basin requires power to work and plants will die if the power is lost.
LanguageData.ClutterAlloyHydroponicsBasinVS.label: hydroponic pot
LanguageData.ClutterAlloyHydroponicsBasinVS.descripti: A hydroponic pot planted into the ground. Requires power.
LanguageData.ClutterAlloyHydroponicsBasinVS_Frame.des: A hydroponic pot planted into the ground. Requires power.
LanguageData.Agrarian.label: hydroponic box
LanguageData.Agrarian.description: A small self-watering 목재en 목재 box with earth in it for growing plants. Requires power.
LanguageData.Agrarian_Blueprint.label: hydroponic box (청사진)
LanguageData.Agrarian_Frame.label: hydroponic box (건설 중)
LanguageData.Agrarian_Frame.description: A small self-watering 목재en 목재 box with earth in it for growing plants. Requires power.
